Description_lang: Purifying Brew instantly heals you for $s1% of the purified Stagger damage.

description_blz.en_US: Purifying Brew instantly heals you for 25% of the purified Stagger damage.
description_blz.es_MX: Brebaje purificador te sana instantáneamente un 25% del daño de Aplazar purificado.
description_blz.pt_BR: Cerveja Purificante cura o equivalente a 25% do dano purificado de Cambalear instantaneamente.
description_blz.de_DE: 'Reinigendes Gebräu' heilt Euch sofort um 25% des entfernten gestaffelten Schadens.
description_blz.en_GB: Purifying Brew instantly heals you for 25% of the purified Stagger damage.
description_blz.es_ES: Brebaje purificador te sana al instante un 25% del daño purificado de Aplazar.
description_blz.fr_FR: Infusion purificatrice vous rend instantanément un montant de points de vie égal à 25% des dégâts de Report purifiés.
description_blz.it_IT: Birra Purificatrice rigenera istantaneamente salute pari al 25% dei danni trascurati purificati.
description_blz.ru_RU: "Очищающий отвар" также восполняет вам здоровье в объеме 25% от отложенного "Пошатыванием" урона.
description_blz.ko_KR: 정화주로 정화한 시간차 피해의 25%만큼 생명력을 즉시 회복합니다.
description_blz.zh_TW: 清心絕釀可立刻恢復相當於其所消除疊加傷害25%的生命力。
description_blz.zh_CN: 活血酒立即为你恢复生命，相当于醉拳所化解伤害的25%。
